profile.about:
I am data scientist and mentor at IBM. At IBM I focusing on Computer Vision problems, Supervised/Unsupervised learning, as such as MLOps and other trending technologies which businesses are interested to apply. Also creating an educational content on Youtube covering areas such as data science, Python programming, book reviews, and other useful topics for a regular data scientist, data anlytic or Machine Learning engineer.

My first deployed application was deployed on Google Cloud Platform, hovewer my favourite cloud provider for ML and MLOps is Amazon Web Service (AWS).

Need a mentor? Have any cool ideas about AI? Reach me in all possible ways provided below!
profile.name: Vytautas Bielinskas

nodes.description: Created the application which able to extract all required information from food product images. The extracted data cover such categorires as nutritions, allergens, and ingredients. For object detection part YOLOv3 was been used; For back-end application ReactJS. Used cloud provider - Microsoft Azure. Technology used - Object detection, Optical Character Recognition (OCR), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Front-end developing with React.
nodes.name: Data extraction from Product images (MVP)

nodes.description: This projects includes both back-end (Keras, Flask with dependencies) and front-end/deployement (HTML, CSS, JS) parts. The project perform X-rays of human lungs classification using CNN with automated image pre-processing and internal procedures. Saved files of inspected models are saved on specific folders in project directory.
nodes.name: Pneumonia in human lungs detector with AI (Deployed on GCP)
